column2: Turns out getting a load more experience CK2 modding makes this easier to implement, nice x3
Throw some coppers at the pauper
Donate some silvers to the needy
Charitably give away some gold coins to the less fortunate
Be a shining beacon of the charitable, donating resplendent platinum coins, each one with the brilliance of the sun, and the coolness of the moon. Truly, a feat worthy of multiple lines of text!
Impressive that you can even see this button, nice one x3
